document.full_text: brian mccann came off the bench in the ninth inning to tie the score with a pinch-hit homer, then hit a game-winning, two-run shot in the 11th for atlanta.
document.title: roundup: with two homers, braves' mccann has productive 'off day'
lines_and_colors: brian mccann came off the bench in the ninth inning to tie the score with a pinch-hit homer, then hit a game-winning, two-run shot in the 11th for atlanta.
